name: Owl Ridge
description:
After a car accident on the way back from a weekend camping, you leave your vehicle to find help on top of Owl Ridge.. but everyone you come across seems a little strange and anything but helpful.

Formally called “My first ever, super awesome computer game what I made from my own brain” but this was too long for the title page. So it’s called “Owl ridge” instead. It’s an 8 bit-ish thing inspired by Monkey Island, Twin Peaks and Wake in Fright. All of which you should check out if you haven’t already. It’s mostly dialogue with obscure references and is specifically designed to be frustrating to play. Oh and if you get to a screen where it says “insert disk 2”. There is no disk 2! I haven’t made it yet. Congrats you’ve completed part 1. It’s a just a sneak peek at a larger story that will eventually emerge from the strangeness. If you like it let me know, and maybe I’ll make it.

Download below, or play the 'Owl-light' version in your browser.

Go easy on me, this is my first game.
